professional_summary: Experienced Systems Administrator with expertise in IT support, database management, and systems optimization. Proven track record in providing technical solutions for both military and civilian environments.

work_experience.company: The Logistics Company, Database/Systems - Fort Bragg, NC
key_responsibilities: Configuring and maintaining SQL Server databases.
Creating reports using Crystal Reports.
Ensuring compliance with operating system policies.
Configuring and maintaining Automated Logistic Information Management System (ALIMS).
Data entry into ALIMS for tracking parts and maintenance costs.
Maintaining SQL 2000 Server database.
Providing professional laptop/desktop support and customer service.
Troubleshooting hardware and network connectivity issues.
Ensuring system stability using DOD-approved operating systems.
Supporting IT operations and maintaining system documentation.
Assisting with database management and data analysis.
Providing technical support for classified and unclassified systems.
